name: Chocolatier: Decadence by Design
storyline: Travel the globe in search of flavorful and exotic ingredients to customize your own chocolate creations. You'll use post-World War II economic and technological advances to customize your very own chocolate creations, assist the Baumiesters, and strive to become CEO of your very own chocolate empire.
summary: Chocolatier: Decadence by Design is an economic sim focused on mouth-watering chocolate, and is the latest installment of the award-winning Chocolatier series. For the first time ever, you have complete control over the ingredients, look, name and description of your customized recipes. How you customize your chocolates has an economic impact on your success. Travel to ports around the globe to discover ingredients, build your empire, and follow the continuing saga of the Baumeister family.
